name: ArcadESC
description:
Glowing screens, buzzing ventilation, creaking floors. 
There's a ghost waiting for you around every corner.

This arcade is like no other. 

You fell asleep in an old arcade and found yourself fighting against waves of monsters.
Only the machines can help you now... but will they? 
Remember.. those things were made to play games after all.

   



    KeyboardGamepadMovementW,A,S,DLeft StickDash RollALTEast ButtonShootJRight Bottom TriggerInteractKSouth ButtonLay TrapLWest ButtonLay BombSpaceNorth Button

     

   
  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Open said .zip file
  3. Run the "ArcadESC.exe"
  4. Enjoy
